page.title: 02Week-end day in Ipplepen.
page.content: On{Saturday mornings}I wake up about 8o'clock. At half past eight I get up and go downstairs to switch on the T.V. After a while I go upstairs again to wash and dress.Sometimes I play with my friends,sometimes we play on the common but not often. { At 12o'clock}we go in the car to do our shopping at Tesco. When we get back we have lunch, that's about half past one. { In the afternoon}we go to visit my Grandma at her house in Dartington. We get home about 5.30. and then have tea. Afterwards we play in the garden or watch television. My brother and I go upstairs at 9.00. and{get ready for {bed.}He goes to bed then, I go at 10.00. { I am ten years old,}my brother is eight years old.
